name: GDStream
description: Share live gameplay with your audience in GD!

title1.name: Chat Settings
title1.description: The settings below modify the appearance of the chat and if it's enabled or not.

chat.name: Chat Enabled
chat.description: Enable chat in-game by default. You can still toggle the chat by pressing "<cr>Shift+C</c>" (toggle unavailable for MacOS)

auto-toggle-chat.name: Auto-Toggle
auto-toggle-chat.description: Automatically toggle chat visibility when opening a level.

title2.name: Profile Settings
title2.description: The settings below modify the appearance of your profile.

pfp.name: Profile Picture
pfp.description: Set your custom profile picture for chat and accounts
